text: donon saagar samaan nahin, yah meetha susvaad hai jisase pyaas jaatee rahe, peene mein ruchikar. aur yah khaara-kaduva hai. aur tum pratyek mein se tarotaaza maans khaate ho aur aabhooshan nikaalate ho, jise tum pahanate ho. aur tum naukaon ko dekhate ho ki cheeratee huee usamen chalee ja rahee hain, taaki tum usaka udaar anugrah talaash karo aur kadaachit tum aabhaaree bano
